de.mrapp.android.bottomsheet

Class BottomSheet.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.mrapp.android.bottomsheet.BottomSheet.Builder
  • Enclosing class:
    BottomSheet

    public static class BottomSheet.Builder
extends java.lang.Object
    A builder, which allows to create and show bottom sheets, which are designed according to Android 5's Material Design guidelines even on pre-Lollipop devices. Such a bottom sheet appears at the bottom of the window and consists of a title and multiple items. It is possible to customize the appearance of the bottom sheet or to replace its title and items with custom views.

    • Constructor Summary

      Creates a new builder, which allows to create bottom sheets, which are designed according to Android 5's Material Design guidelines even on pre-Lollipop devices.

      • Builder

        public Builder(@NonNull
               Context context)
        Creates a new builder, which allows to create bottom sheets, which are designed according to Android 5's Material Design guidelines even on pre-Lollipop devices.
        Parameters:
        context - The context, which should be used by the builder, as an instance of the class Context. The context may not be null

      • Builder

        public Builder(@NonNull
               Context context,
               @StyleRes
               int themeResourceId)
        Creates a new builder, which allows to create bottom sheets, which are designed according to Android 5's Material Design guidelines even on pre-Lollipop devices.
        Parameters:
        context - The context, which should be used by the builder, as an instance of the class Context. The context may not be null
        themeResourceId - The resource id of the theme, which should be used by the bottom sheet, as an Integer value. The resource id must correspond to a valid theme

                                               OnCancelListener listener)

      • setDragSensitivity

        public final BottomSheet.Builder setDragSensitivity(float dragSensitivity)
        Sets the sensitivity, which specifies the distance after which dragging has an effect on the bottom sheet, in relation to an internal value range.
        Parameters:
        dragSensitivity - The drag sensitivity, which should be set, as a Float value. The drag sensitivity must be at lest 0 and at maximum 1
        Returns:
        The builder, the method has been called upon, as an instance of the class BottomSheet.Builder

      • setDimAmount

        public final BottomSheet.Builder setDimAmount(float dimAmount)
        Sets the dim amount, which should be used to darken the area outside the bottom sheet, which is created by the builder.
        Parameters:
        dimAmount - The dim amount, which should be set, as a Float value. The dim amount must be at least 0 (fully transparent) and at maximum 1 (fully opaque)
        Returns:
        The builder, the method has been called upon, as an instance of the class BottomSheet.Builder

      • setWidth

        public final BottomSheet.Builder setWidth(int width)
        Sets the width of the bottom sheet, which is created by the builder. The width is only used on tablet devices or in landscape mode.
        Parameters:
        width - The width, which should be set, in pixels as an Integer value. The width must be at least 1
        Returns:
        The builder, the method has been called upon, as an instance of the class BottomSheet.Builder

      • addItem

        public final BottomSheet.Builder addItem(int id,
                                         @NonNull
                                         java.lang.CharSequence title)
        Adds a new item to the bottom sheet, which is created by the builder.
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the item, which should be added, as an Integer value. The id must be at least 0
        title - The title of the item, which should be added, as an instance of the type CharSequence. The title may neither be null, nor empty
        Returns:
        The builder, the method has been called upon, as an instance of the class BottomSheet.Builder

                                         @NonNull

        icon - The icon of the item, which should be added, as an instance of the class Drawable, or null, if no item should be used

      • setItemEnabled

        public final BottomSheet.Builder setItemEnabled(int index,
                                                boolean enabled)
        Sets, whether the item at a specific index should be enabled, or not.
        Parameters:
        index - The index of the item as an Integer value
        enabled - True, if the item should be enabled, false otherwise

      • setIntent

        public final BottomSheet.Builder setIntent(@NonNull
                                           Activity activity,
                                           @NonNull
                                           Intent intent)
        Adds the apps, which are able to handle a specific intent, as items to the bottom sheet, which is created by the builder. This causes all previously added items to be removed. When an item is clicked, the corresponding app is started.
        Parameters:
        activity - The activity, the bottom sheet, which is created by the builder, belongs to, as an instance of the class Activity. The activity may not be null
        intent - The intent as an instance of the class Intent. The intent may not be null
        Returns:
        The builder, the method has been called upon, as an instance of the class BottomSheet.Builder

      • create

        public final BottomSheet create()
        Creates a bottom sheet with the arguments, which have been supplied to the builder. Calling this method does not display the bottom sheet.
        Returns:
        The bottom sheet, which has been created as an instance of the class BottomSheet

      • show

        public final BottomSheet show()
        Creates a bottom sheet with the arguments, which have been supplied to the builder and immediately displays it.
        Returns:
        The bottom sheet, which has been created, as an instance of the class BottomSheet

      • maximize

        public final BottomSheet maximize()
        Creates a bottom sheet with the arguments, which have been supplied to the builder and immediately maximizes it.
        Returns:
        The bottom sheet, which has been created, as an instance of the class BottomSheet
